items.title: Paint Remover Market Size to Reach USD 2.99 Bn by 2032, says Coherent Market Insights
items.author: Coherent Market Insights
items.description: The global paint remover market is expected to grow from $1.97 billion in 2025 to $2.99 billion by 2032, driven by rising demand in industries like construction and automotive. However, health and environmental concerns related to paint removers are limiting market growth.
